Package it.uninsubria.server.cache

Class DistributedCacheManager

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.server.cache.HybridCacheManager
it.uninsubria.server.cache.DistributedCacheManager
public class DistributedCacheManager extends HybridCacheManager
Distributed Cache Manager: Extends Hybrid Cache with multi-instance synchronization Provides distributed invalidation and synchronization across multiple application instances
